description: The RDF segment defines the content of the row data segments (RDT) in the Tabular Data Response Message (TBR). It is used in two ways:

1.name: Number of Columns per Row
1.description: This field specifies the number of data columns (and therefore the number of fields) contained within each row of returned data.
